channel.title: Help with my new server and i'll make you a mod
channel.description:
if anyone can help me set up my new server...like i mean the basics, just gettin it off the ground (like interacting with NPC's...setting up monster drops...getting the skill menues to work...stuff like that) then i will (like i said) make them a mod or something.
post if you're interested :)

item.title: Help with my new server and i'll make you a mod
